title: Knockback Resistance
description: Determines an entity's resistance to knockback from melee attacks. A value of 0.0 means no resistance, while 1.0 provides full immunity to knockback (like iron golems).

fields.title: Value
fields.description: The amount of knockback resistance, from 0.0 (none) to 1.0 (full immunity).

fields.title: Maximum Value
fields.description: Maximum potential knockback resistance for this entity.
